程序包 com.group_91.customer.entities

类 Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group_91.customer.entities.Customer
  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a customer object. After instantiated in CustomerSignIn class, static variables can be accessed all the time. Access static variable in all other Objects by getCustomerInfo().

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Customer

        public Customer​(java.lang.String ID,
                java.lang.String idType)
        Normal customer constructor.
        参数:
        ID - user id.
        idType - username or memberNo.

      • Customer

        public Customer()
        Non-Membership customer constructor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setCustomerInfoByMemberNo

        public void setCustomerInfoByMemberNo​(java.lang.String memberNo)
        customerInfo setter.

        Will call Jsons.getJSONArray(String) to get all customers list.
        参数:
        memberNo - 8-digit membership number.

      • setCustomerInfoByUsername

        public void setCustomerInfoByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        customerInfo setter.

        Will call Jsons.getJSONArray(String) to get all customers list. Different procedure with setCustomerInfoByMemberNo(String), so we don't refactor two methods.
        参数:
        username - phone / email of user.

      • getCustomerInfo

        public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getCustomerInfo()
        Getter.
        返回:
        customerInfo

      • isValidName

        public static boolean isValidName​(java.lang.String name)
        Name checker. When signing in, first name and last name fields cannot be null.
        参数:
        name - String
        返回:
        true if names are valid otherwise false.

      • isValidGender

        public static boolean isValidGender​(java.lang.String gender)
        Gender checker. When signing in, gender field cannot be null.
        参数:
        gender - String
        返回:
        true if not null

      • isValidUserID

        public static boolean isValidUserID​(java.lang.String loginID)
        Invoke Utils.isValidPhoneOrEmail(String) to check validation of loginID when signing up.
        参数:
        loginID - String
        返回:
        true if valid otherwise false.

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String password)
        Checking procedure for password field when customer signing up.

        Password should be at least 6-characters.
        参数:
        password - String
        返回:
        true if matches constraints.

      • createCustomer

        public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject createCustomer​(java.lang.String firstName,
                                                             java.lang.String lastName,
                                                             java.lang.String gender,
                                                             java.lang.String userLoginID,
                                                             java.lang.String password)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Invoke a JSONObject to save info of customer.
        参数:
        firstName - String
        lastName - String
        gender - String
        userLoginID - String
        password - String (MD5 encrypted)
        返回:
        JSONObject
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown from Utils.MD5EncryptedPassword(String) or Jsons.getJSONFileSize(String).

      • getStamps

        public static int getStamps()
        Get customer's stamps.
        返回:
        int

      • getUsername

        public static java.lang.String getUsername()
        Get customer's username.
        返回:
        String

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName()
        Get customer's name.
        返回:
        String

      • getStatus

        public static boolean getStatus()
        Get status.
        返回:
        true if customer have signed in or false if not signed in.

      • getCustomerID

        public static java.lang.String getCustomerID()
        Get the current customerID. If no customer signs in, return null.
        返回:
        String.

      • isStampsDiscount

        public static boolean isStampsDiscount()
        Check if this customer satisfies stamps discounting condition.
        返回:
        true if satisfaction otherwise false.

      • addStamps

        public static void addStamps​(int amount)
        Invoked if orders are finished.

        Will modify customers.json to increase stamps count of the specific customer.
        参数:
        amount - int

      • minusStamps

        public static void minusStamps​(int amount)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Invoked if orders are finished. Will modify customers.json to decrease stamps count of the specific customer.
        参数:
        amount - int
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if stamps remaining is less than amount.
